dict.acceptation: 资格，授权；条件，限制；合格证书；

sent.orig: Qualification can concern persons, products, processes or systems. EXAMPLE Auditor qualification process, material qualification process.
sent.trans: 鉴定可涉及到人员、产品、过程或体系。示例：审核员鉴定过程、材料鉴定过程。

sent.orig: Performance qualification (PQ) should follow successful completion of Installation qualification and Operational qualification.
sent.trans: 性能确认(PQ)应该在安装确认和运行确认成功完成的基础上进行。

sent.orig: Under any serious circumstances, the relevant post holding qualification or securities practice qualification shall be revoked.
sent.trans: 情节严重的，撤销任职资格或者证券从业资格。

sent.orig: Is there a documented parts qualification and-qualification system in place?
sent.trans: 是否有零件材料供应商的承认书认与取消资格书面系统？

sent.orig: Passed 2007 vocational qualification examination (in the top 30) and obtaining qualification of players.
sent.trans: 通过2007年职业比赛参赛资格考试（前30名）而获参赛资格的球员。
